Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: To cheat or not to cheat? That is the question that faces two city couples: commercial director Dag (Ron Eldard) and his down-to-earth girlfriend Halley (Kyra Sedgwick) ; and peanut-butter mascot Peter (Patrick Breen) and his Prozac-popping girlfriend Rebecca (Marley Shelton). One illicit kiss sends a group of young Manhattanites on a wild ride into the dark side of modern romantic neuroses. In this 21st century metropolis, fate, lust and loss sometimes dangerously, often comically, collide.
Title: Just a Kiss
